body.name: Evenflo Revolve360 Slim 2-in-1 Rotational Car Seat with Quick Clean Cover (Salem Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 22 hrs 34 mins
features: MAXIMIZE SPACE IN YOUR BACKSEAT: Features a streamlined 16.7” footprint to save space for passengers without sacrificing safety, comfort or style
GET IN AND OUT EFFORTLESSLY: One-hand, 360 degree rotation makes it a breeze to get your child in and out of the car — an award-winning innovation that keeps on giving.
GROW WITH IT: Offers rear-facing mode for children weighing from 4 lb to 50 lb (17 in. to 48 in.) and forward-facing mode for children weighing from 22 lb to 65 lb (28 in. to 49 in.)
EXTEND REAR-FACING USE: Allows you to keep your child rear-facing longer as recommended by child safety experts — all the way up to 50 lb.
SECURELY INSTALL WITH EASE: Install the Revolve360 once for rear-facing and forward-facing — Sure360 Safety Installation System with LockStrong and Tether360 make installation safe, secure and simple
KEEP IT FRESH: Offers the convenience of a Quick Clean Cover — easy to remove, easy to wash, easy to live with
body.description: Got a compact vehicle and a little one on the way? Check out the Evenflo® Revolve360™ Slim 2-in-1 Rotational Car Seat with Quick Clean Cover! We slimmed the exterior of our revolutionary car seat to create a 16.7” footprint without sacrificing your child’s seating space or safety. You can fit more of what you love into your backseat with more room for passengers and your growing family! A spin-off of the Revolve360, America’s bestselling rotational car seat, the Revolve360 Slim offers one-hand, 360° rotation in all modes, making it easier to get your child in and out of the car. But a 360° rotating car seat is just the beginning. The Revolve360 Slim offers two modes: rear-facing (4 lb to 50 lb, for a child measuring from 17 in. to 48 in) and forward-facing (22 lb to 65 lb, for a child measuring 28 in. to 49 in.). For peace of mind all the way around, this slim fit car seat offers the extended security of rear-facing all the way up to 50 lb. Child safety experts say the longer your child remains rear-facing, the better. Convenience comes full circle in a rotating car seat you can install just once for rear-facing and forward-facing — no need to uninstall your car seat in order to make the switch. Sure360™ Safety Installation System with LockStrong™ and Tether360™, plus a handy bead-level indicator for leveling in seconds, make one-time installation safe, secure and simple. The best swivel car seat is one that’s easy to keep clean! To keep your Revolve360 Slim car seat looking fresh over years of snacks, spills and all the adventures to come, a handy Quick Clean Cover is included — it’s easy to remove, easy to wash, easy to live with. On-the-go recline means you can adjust the car seat to the perfect angle without having to reinstall the car seat or bother your child. Offering style and ease at every turn, the Revolve360 Slim features premium fabrics and elevated touches to complement your bold moves in style. Discover the new spin on Slim!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and love the rotating feature
reviews.reviewText: I did so much research before deciding and went through lots of video reviews. I was looking for ease of installation but also super durable and comfortable. My son absolutely loved the seats comfort and cushion. I couldn’t believe it he feel asleep both times he was in it the first time.This is going to be crucial as we often take long road trips to visit the in laws. I needed the rotation bc it’s hard for me to get him in the seat and avoid bumping his head when he wiggles. He is 14m now and I expect him to grow pretty fast so let’s see how this goes. Happy with the purchase. I could have spent less or more but for me I need the product to work. I will pay more if it’s what I need to do. I thought this was a good value and the slim design is best for more compact cars. Happy with this purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile love the 360 rotation
reviews.reviewText: Great product, easy to install and love the slim fit in the vehicle

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy access and well made.
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for my grandchild. My wife and I are not Spring chickens anymore and this car seat allows us to secure the toddler properly without stressing or struggling because the chair rotates 90 degrees! The child faces you for fastening or releasing the straps, totally makes sense. It’s a real back saver too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely love this seat!
reviews.reviewText: Using this seat for my third child, oh my gosh, it’s amazing! First, the install is an absolute breeze!! The quality of the seat is top notch!! Love being able to turn the seat sideways, to get my baby in or out! Such a game changer, when it comes to getting babies in a seat!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great but still large
reviews.reviewText: Great quality item, but still takes a large space in a smaller car. Which is not to say it’s bad! the space it needs is due to the rotational capability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Saves from those unwanted head bumps on the car door frame
reviews.reviewText: Fairly easy to install after watching YouTube. Much easier to place a little fussy man into than a non rotating. A little bulky, but seems sturdy so far!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am obsessed with this car seat. I just transitioned my 5 month old to it. The installation is so easy, the swivel mechanism is smooth and it’s so easy to get my baby in and out of the car. A must have for sure!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's great just wish it was cheaper..
reviews.reviewText: Love the quality, comfort, security and the swivel. My son doesn't slouch his head anymore or go forward when we accelerate like his infant seat. (Yes the buckle was at his armpits)I don't really like that it doesn't have a carry handle. Tonight I realized that if my son falls asleep we have to physically remove him when we get home which wakes him up instead of being able to easily carry him in the seat still sound asleep. We get in the door and usually have a few minutes to set things down before he wakes up. Also there's no pull over shade to keep the sun out of his eyes in the car. Pretty dissapointed about that. And I can't easily put him in the stroller or grocery cart like my other infant car seat. My son just turned 5 months so we're in this in-between stage where he's almost too big for his infant seat, and can't sit on his own in a shopping cart. So there's that, but I hate carrying him in his infant car seat cause its so darn heavy with him in it and it doesn't swivel so I hurt my back and arms almost everytime taking him places and it makes me not want to leave the house. I know I just contradicted myself there from an earlier statement I made but I'm so 50/50 on which seat to use right now BTW I'm only 4'11" and live on the 3rd floor of an apartment with lots of stairs so yeah tough predicament.

We have been using this car seat for almost six months now and I am still very happy with it. It is so easy to turn and adjust and our toddler is very comfortable in it. We have had no complaints or issues at all. It was expensive but we use it every day and will for several years to come.
Es bueno muy práctico y cómodo solo los ganchos del cinturón son muy duros y pueden llegar a lastimar las piernas de tu bb pero tiene solución. Excelente compra
